   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
    var readgrp = (g_form.getValue('group_r'));
	
	if (readgrp.substring(0,3)== "GG_")
			{
				var check = yes;
				
			}
	else
	{
      alert ('Please enter the valid group name');
   g_form.clearValue('group_r');
   }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nxf52093</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-24 10:00:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>63a5eaffdb783458effc34523996199c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check the read group contains GG</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NXP GAF Share Automation" source="x_nxps3_nxp_gaf_sh">4a417d661b85005017daa6886e4bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NXP GAF Share Automation">4a417d661b85005017daa6886e4bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_63a5eaffdb783458effc34523996199c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nxf52093</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-24 10:00:05</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
